successes.title: NED RIFLE
successes.description: The thrilling conclusion to a story it took 20 years to tell—HENRY FOOL, FAY GRIM, and now, shooting in spring 2014...

Pledges.description:
BEHIND THE SCENES PRODUCTION ACCESS —  
Everyone who pledges $1 or more will be granted access to the "Ned Rifle Behind the Scenes Production Blog". It will be kept exclusive to those who have been a part of this Kickstarter project from day one: just a way of saying thanks for stepping up to the plate early on and a way to keep you involved in the process. The backer exclusive page will be updated weekly with behind the scenes photos, stories, and videos during the pre-production, production, and post-production of Ned Rifle. Pledge now at any level and encourage your friends to do so too!
DOWNLOAD any two items available from possiblefilms.com

ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK CD: this will be all the new music for NED RIFLE and newly performed variations on themes from HENRY FOOL and FAY GRIM. We want to design a special package with lots of photos and notes. And we'll also provide you a link to download it to your computer or mobile device etcetera.
DVD of NED RIFLE
SCENARIO: the published screenplay.
DVD of NED RIFLE and ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK CD
BLURAY of NED RIFLE
DVD of NED RIFLE, ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK CD, and the published SCENARIO.
DVD and BLU-RAY and ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK CD.
BLURAY of NED RIFLE, ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK CD, and the published SCENARIO.
DVD, BLURAY, SCENARIO (autographed by Hal), and CD.

DVD, BLURAY, SCENARIO (autographed by Hal), the CD, and FROM HERE TO THE STATION: a hard cover book of Hal's drawings from his teenage years till recently with brief notes. It has photos of his theater productions as well, and sketches, diagrams, and storyboards from many of his films. 7 x 7 inches, full color. Never available anywhere else.
FROM HERE TO THE STATION (autographed by Hal and numbered) along with the DVD, BLURAY, SCENARIO (autographed by Hal), and CD.

PREMIERE: All rewards, (books autographed), PLUS invitation for you and a guest to the NYC premiere of NED RIFLE and the pre-screening "meet and greet."  (NOTE: you have to get yourself to NYC on your own, though, and find a place to stay!)

FILMMAKER'S FRIEND - All rewards, autographed, PLUS invitation for you and a guest to the NYC premiere of NED RIFLE, the pre-screening "meet and greet"AND the after party. You will also be credited at the end of the film as "Filmmaker's Friend." (NOTE: you have to get yourself to NYC on your own, though, and find a place to stay!)

LUNCH WITH PARKER POSEY & HAL - In New York, within a year of the success of the campaign (December 4, 2013). (Or, if you just want to talk to Parker, I'll go sit in the bar!) You will also receive the DVD, BLURAY, SCENARIO (autographed), the CD, and FROM HERE TO THE STATION (autographed). And, of course, you're invited to the premiere, meet-and-greet, and after party. We'd love to meet you.

LUNCH with JAMES URBANIAK - he's usually with his family in Los Angeles, so this is a good chance for you west coast folks to spend some quality time with the man behind DR THADDEUS VENTURE!! of the Venture Bros show. As you can see from the various videos we've posted, he's a compelling conversationalist.

ASSOCIATE PRODUCER: receive credit as "associate producer" on screen in the end titles of NED RIFLE. Receive the DVD, BLURAY, SCENARIO (autographed), the CD, and FROM HERE TO THE STATION (autographed) and join us (with a guest) for the premiere, meet n' greet, and after party in NYC. (NOTE: you must get yourself to NYC on your own and find a place to stay!)

HONORARY DEGREE — The Ned Rifle Super Wise Teenager Scholarship Prize: all rewards plus credit in film at end of movie and prominently displayed in the DVD/BluRay artwork. You will receive the actual degree which will be a prop in the film as well! And it will include an original and singular (no copies) photo of Liam Aiken as Ned Rifle, autographed.

CO-PRODUCER: receive credit as "co-producer" on screen in the opening titles of NED RIFLE. Receive the DVD, BLURAY, SCENARIO (autographed), the CD, and FROM HERE TO THE STATION (autographed) and join us (with a guest) for the premiere, meet n' greet, and after party in NYC. (NOTE: you must get yourself to NYC on your own and find a place to stay!)

HONORARY DEGREE — The Simon Grim Endowment for the Advancement of Garbagemen: all rewards plus credit in film at end of movie and prominently displayed in the DVD/BluRay artwork. You will receive the actual degree which will be a prop in the film as well! And it will include an original and singular (no copies) photo of James Urbaniak as Simon Grim, autographed.

CO-EXECUTIVE PRODUCER: receive credit as "co-executive producer" on screen in opening titles Receive the CD, the DVD & BluRay, the Scenario & From Here to the Station, all autographed and numbered, and join us (with a guest) for the premiere, meet n' greet, and after party in NYC. (NOTE: you must get yourself to NYC on your own and find a place to stay!) ALSO: visit the set of the film and share lunch with Hal and the lead actors. We'll provide you well in advance with the days Parker Posey, Tom Ryan, James Urbaniak, and Liam Aiken are working. The film will shoot over the course of 24 days between mid March and mid April 2014.

HONORARY DEGREE — The Fay Grim Mystery Achievement Award: all rewards plus credit in film at end of movie and prominently displayed in the DVD/BluRay artwork. You will receive the actual degree which will be a prop in the film as well! And it will include an original and singular (no copies) photo of Parker Posey as Fay Grim, autographed.

EXECUTIVE PRODUCER: receive credit as "executive producer" on screen in opening titles and in all paid advertising where I am listed as Director. Receive the CD, the DVD & BluRay, the Scenario & From Here to the Station, all autographed and numbered, and join us (with a guest) for the premiere, meet n' greet, and after party in NYC. (NOTE: you must get yourself to NYC on your own and find a place to stay!)

HONORARY DEGREE — The Henry Fool medal of Elective Affinities: all rewards plus credit in film at end of movie and prominently displayed in the DVD/BluRay artwork. You will receive the actual degree which will be a prop in the film as well! And it will include an original and singular (no copies) photo of Thomas Jay Ryan as Henry Fool himself, autographed.
